TopicDetails.title: European Film sales agent

latestInfos.content:
47 proposals have been submitted.

Evaluation results are expected to be communicated by December 2024.

There will be an information session on the Call European Film Sales 2024 on Wenesday 5 June at 2.30 pm CET.

The meeting link and login details are at the bottom of this EACEA Webpage. Slides will be published there after the presentation.

The meeting will not be recorded.

the info-session does not require registration and is open to all potentials applicants.

There are two important news items:

  1. There will be an information session on the new call European Film Sales 2024 at the Berlinale

Date: Sunday 18/02/2024.

Time: 09:45 AM – 10:15 AM.

Venue: Gropius Dome – Conference Lounge.

Address: Niederkirchnerstraße 7.

Access: no accreditation needed (everybody is welcome).

 

  1. The list of non-EU participating countries had been updated on 1/02/2024 with changes in the level of participation of Montenegro and Tunisia.

TopicDetails.description:
ExpectedOutcome:

Expected results:

Improvement in the trans-national distribution of recent non-national European films.

Increase in the investment in the production, acquisition, promotion, theatrical and online distribution of non-national European films.

Develop links between the production and distribution sector thus improving the competitive position of non-national European film.

Description of the activities:

There are two phases for the funded activities:

1. The generation of a potential fund which will be attributed according to the performance of the company on the European market.

2. The implementation of the action - the potential fund thus generated by each company must be reinvested in:

-minimum guarantees or advances paid for the international sales rights on eligible non-national European films;

-the promotion, marketing and advertising on the market of eligible non-national European films.
TopicDetails.conditions:
1.   Eligible countries: as described in the Call document.


2.   Eligibility and admissibility conditions: as described in the Call document.

 

3. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template.

4.   Evaluation

Evaluation criteria, scoring, threshold and process are described in the Call document. 

5.   Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement: as described in the Call document.

Publication of the call:    5 December 2023

Deadline for submitting applications:              20 June 2024 17:00 (Brussels Time)

Evaluation period:                                           July-October 2024

Information to applicants:                                December 2024

Signature of grant agreement:                        March 2025 

6.   Proposal templates, guidance and model grant agreements (MGA):

       Standard proposal template
Call document
Guide for applicants
Mono/Multi-beneficiary Model Grant Agreement

       List of Films

       Information on Independence and Ownership Control
TopicDetails.supportInfo:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

For general information on the programme and the call, please contact your local Creative Europe Desk.

Or the European Education and Culture Executive Agency: EACEA-DISTRIBUTION-SALESAGENTS@ec.europa.eu  

Funding & Tenders Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals.

IT Helpdesk – Contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Online Manual – Step-by-step online guide through the Portal processes from proposal preparation and submission to reporting on your on-going project. Valid for all 2021-2027 programmes.
TopicDetails.sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service, please click on the submission-button next to the type of action and the type of model grant agreement that corresponds to your proposal. You will then be asked to confirm your choice, as it cannot be changed in the submission system. Upon confirmation, you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Funding & Tenders Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.

latestInfos.content: The submission session is now available for: CREA-MEDIA-2024-FILMSALES(CREA-PJG)
